Container.Name: Firefly-III
Container.Overview:
"Firefly III" is a (self-hosted) manager for your personal finances. It can help you keep track of your expenses and income, so you can spend less and save more. Firefly III supports the use of budgets, categories and tags. Using a bunch of external tools, you can import data. It also has many neat financial reports available.
Additional environment variables can be found under https://github.com/firefly-iii/firefly-iii/blob/main/.env.example

Config.Name: EXPORT_PATH
Config.Description: Container Path: /var/www/firefly-iii/storage/export - Exported files are stored here

Config.Name: UPLOAD_PATH
Config.Description: Container Path: /var/www/firefly-iii/storage/upload - Uploaded files that are used for bulk importing are stored here

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 8080

Config.Name: DB_CONNECTION
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_CONNECTION - Database type ('pgsql', 'mysql', 'sqlite')

Config.Name: DB_HOST
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_HOST - Database host, e.g. 192.168.0.3

Config.Name: DB_PORT
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_PORT - Database port, e.g. 3306

Config.Name: DB_DATABASE
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_DATABASE - Database name

Config.Name: DB_USERNAME
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_USERNAME - Database username. It is recommended to create a dedicated user for Firefly.

Config.Name: DB_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_PASSWORD - Database password

Config.Name: APP_KEY
Config.Description: Container Variable: APP_KEY - The encryption key for your sessions. Keep this very secure. If you generate a new one all existing attachments must be considered LOST. Change it to a string of exactly 32 chars.

Config.Name: TRUSTED_PROXIES
Config.Description: Container Variable: TRUSTED_PROXIES - Set to ** when using reverse proxy.

Config.Name: MAIL_MAILER
Config.Description: Container Variable: MAIL_MAILER - Refer to https://docs.firefly-iii.org/advanced-installation/email for more information

Config.Name: MAIL_HOST
Config.Description: Container Variable: MAIL_HOST

Config.Name: MAIL_PORT
Config.Description: Container Variable: MAIL_PORT

Config.Name: MAIL_FROM
Config.Description: Container Variable: MAIL_FROM

Config.Name: MAIL_USERNAME
Config.Description: Container Variable: MAIL_USERNAME

Config.Name: MAIL_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Container Variable: MAIL_PASSWORD

Config.Name: MAIL_ENCRYPTION
Config.Description: Container Variable: MAIL_ENCRYPTION

Config.Name: APP_URL
Config.Description: Container Variable: APP_URL - Only used when sending emails.

Config.Name: SEND_ERROR_MESSAGE
Config.Description: Container Variable: SEND_ERROR_MESSAGE - Sends email if error occurs

Container.Description:
"Firefly III" is a (self-hosted) manager for your personal finances. It can help you keep track of your expenses and income, so you can spend less and save more. Firefly III supports the use of budgets, categories and tags. Using a bunch of external tools, you can import data. It also has many neat financial reports available.
Additional environment variables can be found under https://github.com/firefly-iii/firefly-iii/blob/main/.env.example
